amendment.description: To provide loan repayment for prosecutors and public defenders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2377 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2377 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9749-9752, S9767; text: CR S9750-9751) To provide loan repayment for prosecutors and public defenders.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2377 proposed by Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2377 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
